verses.name: Matthew 23:6
verses.text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts, and the chief seats in the synagogues,

verses.name: Matthew 23:7
verses.text: And greetings in the markets, and to be called of men, Rabbi, Rabbi.

verses.name: Matthew 23:8
verses.text: But be not ye called Rabbi: for one is your Master, even Christ; and all ye are brethren.

verses.name: Matthew 23:9
verses.text: And call no man your father upon the earth: for one is your Father, which is in heaven.

verses.name: Matthew 23:10
verses.text: Neither be ye called masters: for one is your Master, even Christ.

verses.name: Matthew 23:11
verses.text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant.
